text: parisuddhavantayinta porondu dena lada svargayehi tatvaya nam, ehi diya dahara sadakal galaminma ætteya. ehi (ovunta) lækhena ahara (kisidaka novælækvena) sthira evaya. ehi sevanæli (e akarayatama sthiraya). meyayi bhaya bhaktikayinge avasanaya vanne. pratiksepa karannange avasanaya nam nirayayi
